abstract: bacanora minerals ltd com hits new 52-week high after analyst upgrade .
article: shares of bacanora minerals ltd com hit a new 52-week high during mid-day trading on thursday after canaccord genuity raised their price target on the stock from gbx 120 to gbx 175 . canaccord genuity currently has a speculative buy rating on the stock . bacanora minerals ltd com traded as high as gbx 128.84 and last traded at gbx 128 , with a volume of 1239916 shares traded . the stock had previously closed at gbx 128 . bcn has been the subject of several other research reports . shore capital reaffirmed a `` not rated '' rating on shares of bacanora minerals ltd com in a research note on tuesday , november 28th .

numis securities lowered bacanora minerals ltd com from a `` buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating and dropped their price objective for the company from gbx 140 to gbx 110 in a research note on monday , december 18th . canaccord genuity group reissued a `` speculative buy '' rating and set a gbx 120 price objective on shares of bacanora minerals ltd com in a research note on thursday , november 2nd . shore capital group reissued a `` not rated '' rating on shares of bacanora minerals ltd com in a research note on thursday , november 2nd .

finally , liberum capital reissued a `` buy '' rating and set a gbx 120 price objective on shares of bacanora minerals ltd com in a research note on tuesday , december 19th . three investment analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and one has given a buy rating to the stock . the company presently has a consensus rating of `` hold '' and a consensus target price of gbx 131.25 . about bacanora minerals ltd combacanora minerals ltd. , an exploration stage mining company , engages in the identification , acquisition , exploration , and development of mineral properties in mexico .

it primarily focuses on lithium and borates . the company 's primary assets include the sonora lithium project , which consists of 10 mining concession area covering approximately 100 thousand hectares in the northeast of sonora state ; and the magdalena borate project that covers 16,503 hectares in sonora state .
